title: Bee’s Knees at The Garage Cafe & Bistro in Gardens
blurb: Fun, laid-back cafe & bistro in Botanic Gardens.
description: Bee’s Knees is a fun, laid-back cafe & bistro concept that draws inspiration from the highly social, evolved behaviour of bees. The first Bee’s Knees opened in 2017 at The Garage, Singapore Botanic Gardens, fast becoming a hot spot for the simplest most joyous occasions in our lives: pet owners to chill with their furkids al fresco, parents to dine in peace while their little ones totter about, and a cozy respite for social get-togethers. Dig in to comfort food elevated to be hearty and satisfying with South East Asian touches. With a wholesome and diverse menu with vegetarian options, the little ones, the health-conscious, the indulgent, and the alcoholic all get something under one hive.
datetime_display: Daily | 8am to 10pm (last food order is at 9:30pm)
full_address: BEE’S KNEES AT THE GARAGE 50 Cluny Park Road, Level 1 Singapore Botanic Gardens, Singapore 257488 +65 9815 3213 beesknees@thegarage

title: Bees Knees at The Garage: Family-Friendly Dining
blurb: Casual dining amidst lush greenery, family-friendly spot.
description: Bees Knees at The Garage offers a relaxed and family-friendly dining experience surrounded by the beautiful greenery of the Singapore Botanic Gardens. It's a great place for families to enjoy a meal together in a casual setting. The menu features a variety of dishes suitable for both adults and children, making it an ideal spot for a family outing. Enjoy the scenic views and the peaceful atmosphere while savoring delicious food with your loved ones. The venue provides a welcoming environment for families with young children, ensuring a pleasant dining experience for everyone. With its convenient location and kid-friendly options, Bees Knees is a popular choice for families looking for a memorable meal.
full_address: 50 Cluny Park Road, Level 1 Singapore Botanic Gardens, Singapore 257488

title: Bee’s Knees at The Garage
blurb: All-day dining cafe with kids menu and outdoor space.
description: Bee’s Knees at The Garage is a casual all-day dining cafe located in the Singapore Botanic Gardens. It offers a family-friendly atmosphere with a dedicated kids menu and an outdoor space where children can play. The cafe serves a variety of dishes, including pasta, pizza, sandwiches, and desserts. It's a great spot for families looking for a relaxed meal in a beautiful setting. The venue provides a comfortable and welcoming environment for families with young children, making it an ideal choice for a casual outing.
full_address: 50 Cluny Park Road, Level 1 Singapore Botanic Gardens, Singapore 257488

title: Bee’s Knees - Moon Lite Dinners Experience
blurb: Unwind under the stars with comfort food and drinks!
description: Bee’s Knees transforms into a cosy, moonlit retreat as the sun sets. Join us daily from 6 PM onwards and unwind under the stars with delicious comfort food, refreshing drinks, and a laid-back atmosphere. Whether it’s a casual date, or a gathering with friends, our Moon-Lite Dinner is the perfect way to end your day. Enjoy a family-friendly atmosphere with a menu that caters to both adults and children. The setting is perfect for a relaxed evening out, offering a comfortable and inviting space for families to spend quality time together. The venue provides a welcoming environment for all ages.
full_address: 50 Cluny Park Road, Level 1 Singapore Botanic Gardens, Singapore 257488
